ruleContent.content: let url = baseUrl; let Thread = Packages.java.lang.Thread; // 灰色章节处理 if (/data/.test(url)) { burl = java.hexDecodeToString(result); if (/baidu.com/.test(burl)) { pre = burl.replace("baidu", "bilinovel"); url = source.getKey() + java.ajax(pre).match(/prevpage="([^"]+)"/)[1]; Thread.sleep(1000); java.setContent(src = java.ajax(url)); } else { nex = burl.replace("cn.bing", "www.bilinovel"); do { next = "Error 1015"; while (next == "Error 1015") { Thread.sleep(3000); next = String(java.ajax(nex)); if (next != "Error 1015") { break; } } nex = source.getKey() + next.match(/nextpage="([^"]+)"/)[1]; /_\d+\.html/.test(nex) ? flag = true : flag = false; } while (flag); url = nex; java.setContent(src = java.ajax(url)); } } // java.log(result) // 处理页面错误 if (String(result).match(/1015|503/)) { Thread.sleep(5000); java.setContent(src = java.ajax(url)); } // 处理设备检测 if(String(result).match(/反馈设备详细信息|不支持/gi)) { // java.log(cookie.getCookie(url)); cookie.replaceCookie(url, java.webView(null, url, "document.cookie")); Thread.sleep(1000); java.setContent(src = java.ajax(url)); } var src = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(src) var h = src.select('[id*=content]>*:not(script):not(.cgo)') if (h == "") { Thread.sleep(2000) var src = org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(baseUrl)) var h = src.select('[id*=content]>*:not(script):not(.cgo)') } // var st = java.getString('script@html'); var st = java.getString('style@html') if (/woff2/.test(st)) { rule = st.match(/#acontent\s+p\s*([^,]+)/)[1]; selector = `p${rule}`; c = h.select(selector).text(); var f1 = java.queryTTF('https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/yolo52/Yuedu@main/read.ttf'); var f2 = java.queryTTF('https://fastly.jsdelivr.net/gh/yolo52/Yuedu@main/bili.ttf'); var res = java.replaceFont(c, f1, f2, true); h = String(h).replace(c, res); } /*备用，实际不需要 function getComic(str) { mat = String(str).match(//g) if (!mat) return ""; let html = '' for (i of mat) { html += `\n` } return html } h = getComic(h) */ String(h).replace(/\s*<\/?shirika>\s*/g, '') java.log(book.type) if(book.type==8){ var options = {"headers": {"User-Agent": "Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/124.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36", "Referer": bilinovel}}; options=JSON.stringify(options); var content=java.getString("p@text",h); var img=java.getString("img@data-src",h); java.log(content); var img_data = img.split('\n').filter(url => url.trim() !== ''); var imgTags = img_data.map(item => '').join('\n'); var result=content + imgTags; }else { var img=java.getString("img@data-src",h); var options = {"headers": { 'authority': 'i.motiezw.com', 'accept': 'image/avif,image/webp,image/apng,image/svg+xml,image/*,*/*;q=0.8', 'accept-language': 'zh-CN,zh;q=0.9', 'cache-control': 'no-cache', 'pragma': 'no-cache', 'referer': 'https://www.bilimanga.net/', 'sec-ch-ua': '"Not)A;Brand";v="24", "Chromium";v="116"', 'sec-ch-ua-mobile': '?1', 'sec-ch-ua-platform': '"Android"', 'sec-fetch-dest': 'image', 'sec-fetch-mode': 'no-cors', 'sec-fetch-site': 'cross-site', 'user-agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/116.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36', }}; options=JSON.stringify(options); var img_data = img.split('\n').filter(url => url.trim() !== ''); var imgTags = img_data.map(item => '').join('\n'); var result= imgTags; } result

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var detail = result.match(/.*detail\/.*/);
if (detail) {
     book.type=64     
} else {
		  book.type=8  
	  }
		java.log(book.type)   
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
var document = JsDom.parse(src);

var result = [];

var volumes = document.select(".catalog-volume");
for (var i = 0; i < volumes.size(); i++) {
    var volElement = volumes.get(i);
    
   
    var volTitle = "";
    var volBar = volElement.select(".chapter-bar").first();
    if (volBar) {
        volTitle = volBar.text().trim();
    }
    
   
    var chapters = volElement.select(".chapter-li");
    for (var j = 0; j < chapters.size(); j++) {
        var chapter = chapters.get(j);
        var link = chapter.select("a").first();
        
        if (link) {
            var entry = {
                "text": link.text().trim(),
                "url": link.attr("href").trim(),
                "vol": volTitle
            };
            result.push(entry);
        }
    }
}

result;</js>

searchUrl:
<js>
function processKey() {
  var pattern = /(?:\s+)?@(小说|漫画)(?:\s+)?$/;
  var match = key.match(pattern);
   let originalType = 0;
  if (match) {
      key = key.replace(pattern, "").trim();
      originalType = match[1] === "漫画" ? 1 : 0;
  }
   return {
   	text: key,
    type: originalType
  };
}
var result = processKey(); 

var keyxmode=result.type;
//java.log(keyxmode);
if(keyxmode == 0){
    java.log("当前为小说模式");
    
    page==1?
'https://www.bilinovel.com/search.html?searchkey='+result.text+',{"headers": {"referer": "https://www.bilinovel.com/search.html"}}'
:

'https://www.bilinovel.com/search/'+result.text+'_{{page}}.html,{"headers": {"referer": "${bilinovel}search.html"}}'
    
}else{
    java.log("当前为漫画模式模式");
    page==1?
'https://www.bilimanga.net/search.html?searchkey='+result.text+',{"headers": {"referer": "https://www.bilimanga.net/search.html"}}'
:

'https://www.bilimanga.net/search/'+result.text+'_{{page}}.html,{"headers": {"referer": "https://www.bilimanga.net/search.html"}}'
    
}
</js>

ruleContent.replaceRegex: ##\s*({{ book.durChapterTitle }}|.*作者：.*|\(本章完\)|PS：.*求推荐！|PS：.*求收藏！|感谢.*打赏.*|感谢.*推荐票.*|感谢.*月票.*|（.*月票.*）|（为大家的.*票加更.*）|第二更在.*|为防止采集.*支持！|网址：deqixs\.com|必应.*说网|55\..{3}.*|\(\s*\)|如果您.*观看！|（看完.*阅读！.*）|loadAdv.*)\s*
